英文法規名稱: Fee-Charging Standards of Taiping Suspension Bridge, Meishan Township, Chiayi County
中文法規名稱: 嘉義梅山太平雲梯登梯收費標準
沿革內容: 1.Promulgated by Order Guan-li-Guan-zi No. 1060300609, dated September 25, 2017.

法規內容.條文內容: These Standards are prescribed pursuant to the provisions of Article 10, Paragraph 1 of the Charges and Fees Act.

Fee-charging standards for Taiping Suspension Bridge, Meishan, Chiayi are as follows：
1.General public：NTD$150.
2.Discounted ticket：NTD$120.
（1）Groups：18 visitors and above.
（2）Students with student IDs.
3.Special discounted ticket：NTD$75.
（1）Children aged 7 to 12, with IDs.
（2）Seniors aged 65 or older.

All visitors will be charged based on these Standards, except for those with one of the following identities：
1.Preschoolers aged 0 to 6, with IDs.
2.People with disabilities who hold disability manuals, and one accompanying person with each disabled visitor.
3.Holders of honorary cards for voluntary service（issued in accordance with Volunteer Service Act only）.
4.Residents of Taiping Village, Meishan Township, Chiayi County who use the bridge for forestry/agricultural purposes（with IDs）.
Visitors with one of these identities may need to pay group insurance premiums.

Tickets will be refunded, without interest, in case the Alishan National Scenic Area Administration, Tourism Bureau, Ministry of Transportation and Communications,Republic of China announces the closing of the bridge due to natural disasters or other irresistible reasons.
These Standards shall take effect on the date of promulgation.
